com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.client

Interface ReplicationServerListener


  • public interface ReplicationServerListener
    Listener for the replication server state changes.

    Listener to allow implementations to be informed of replication server state changes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void newRemoteLogger(LoggerCoordinates coordinates, LoggerMetadata metadata)
      Invoked when a new remote logger appears in the mbean server.
      void remoteLoggerChanged(LoggerCoordinates coordinates, LoggerMetadata metadata)
      Invoked when the remote logger is changed.
      void remoteLoggerDirectoryScan(LoggerCoordinates coordinates, List<FileInfo> directoryScan)
      Invoked when a remote logger directory scan has taken place and this has resulted in directory changes.
      void remoteLoggerGone(LoggerCoordinates coordinates)
      Invoked when the remote logger disappears from the mbean server.
      void replicationServerOffline(ReplicationServerCoordinates coordinates)
      Invoked when a replication server disappears from the mbean server.
      void replicationServerOnline(LogsReplicationServerBeanWrapper replicationServerBeanWrapper, ReplicationServerCoordinates coordinates)
      Invoked when a replication server appears in the mbean server.

    • Method Detail

      • remoteLoggerDirectoryScan

        void remoteLoggerDirectoryScan(LoggerCoordinates coordinates,
                               List<FileInfo> directoryScan)
        Invoked when a remote logger directory scan has taken place and this has resulted in directory changes.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - The unique coordinates identifying the logger.
        directoryScan - A directory scan snapshot.

      • newRemoteLogger

        void newRemoteLogger(LoggerCoordinates coordinates,
                     LoggerMetadata metadata)
        Invoked when a new remote logger appears in the mbean server.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - The unique coordinates identifying the logger.
        metadata - The value of the remote logger metadata.

      • remoteLoggerGone

        void remoteLoggerGone(LoggerCoordinates coordinates)
        Invoked when the remote logger disappears from the mbean server.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - The unique coordinates identifying the logger.

      • remoteLoggerChanged

        void remoteLoggerChanged(LoggerCoordinates coordinates,
                         LoggerMetadata metadata)
        Invoked when the remote logger is changed.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - The unique coordinates identifying the logger.
        metadata - The value of the remote logger metadata.

      • replicationServerOnline

        void replicationServerOnline(LogsReplicationServerBeanWrapper replicationServerBeanWrapper,
                             ReplicationServerCoordinates coordinates)
        Invoked when a replication server appears in the mbean server.
        Parameters:
        replicationServerBeanWrapper - A wrapper class wrapping the replication server mxbean.
        coordinates - The unique coordinates identifying the replication server.

      • replicationServerOffline

        void replicationServerOffline(ReplicationServerCoordinates coordinates)
        Invoked when a replication server disappears from the mbean server.
        Parameters:
        coordinates - The unique coordinates identifying the replication server.
